title: A shield of defence against the arrovves of schisme shot abroad by Iean de L'escluse in his advertisment against Mr. Brightman Here vnto is prefixed a declaration touching a booke intituled, The profane schisme of the Brovvnists. By Iohn Fovvler. Clement Saunders. Robert Bulvvarde.
author: Fowler, John, Brownist.
publisher: By Henry Laurenson dvvelling vpon the vvater at the signe of the vvriting booke,
